name: Workbot Duo
description:
!!! Please play on fullscreen mode when you're playing on browser !!!

A small puzzle game where two robots work together, pushing some boxes. Enjoy!

[Controls]

Mouse click - Command

R - Reset

Z - Undo

Left Shift - Switch Character

[Helpful Tips]

1-Red one always go first, keep that in mind!

2-You can try some different levels when you are stuck.

3-Pressing R in playmode doesn't reset the commands. If not in playmode, it does.

[Credits]

Font: https://www.dafont.com/golden-age.font

Sound Effects:

https://freesound.org/people/andersmmg/sounds/523423/
https://freesound.org/people/Wagna/sounds/326133/
https://freesound.org/people/plasterbrain/sounds/399095

Every art and the music was made from scratch by me, used some pre-made codes for programming.
